coreAtributes.authorTag: Sewn into one of the sides is a tag that reads "STITCHED WITH LOVE AND MALICE BY TROOPS #P01-Y & #B100-M "
coreAtributes.name: Imperial under-shirt
coreAtributes.description: A common frilled under shirt. The sleeves and abdominal area are skintight as to fit under armor, Its also normal for it to be worn as a regular shirt. #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN However the gods will be constantly judging you for wearing stripes. #ELSE It has a common wide stripe pattern which is an imperial standard. #ENDIF

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s undershirt and roughly pull it off over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your undershirt and roughly pulls it off over your head.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s undershirt and roughly pulls it off over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.arms] up as you pull the undershirt on [npc.herHim].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the undershirt down over [npc.her] head, before pulling it down over [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides your [pc.arms] in the undershirt, before pulling it down over your torso.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the undershirt down over your head, before pushing your [pc.arms] through the sleeves.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name]'s [npc2.arms] in the undershirt before pulling it down over [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the undershirt down over [npc2.her] head, before pulling it down over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You pop open the buttons on [npc.name]'s shirt.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] pops open the buttons on your shirt.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] pops open the buttons on [npc2.name]'s shirt.

replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] buttons up [npc.her] shirt to cover [npc.her] torso.
